snippet: Alberto Contador maintained his overall lead at the Tour of the Basque Country, while Michael Matthews of Australia won the long third stage.
abstract: Michael Matthews wins third stage of Tour of the Basque Country bicycle race.
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador maintained his overall lead at the Tour of the Basque Country, while Michael Matthews of Australia won the long third stage.
